Monster.name: JOEL ROSS
Monster.desc: Oh no! You've run into JOEL ROSS!
Monster.playerWin: JOEL ROSS died from reading your awfully terrible code.
Monster.monsterWin: JOEL ROSS tells you to have a wonderful day, while simultaneously kicking you out of the University of Washington for having awful code.

Items.name: BAD CODE
Items.passive: For some reason, your laptop is open and sitting on the ground with the BAD CODE that you wrote for INFO 498 open on the desktop.
Items.active: You display your BAD CODE for all the world to see! Then you put it away.

Items.name: RAY BANS
Items.passive: You see one of your friends passed out on the sidewalk wearing RAY BANS.
Items.active: You wear the RAY BANS. You look pretty cool now, and slightly unrecognizable.

Items.name: AIRPODS
Items.passive: Someone seems to have dropped their AIRPODS on the ground.
Items.active: You wear the AIRPODS. Now everyone will assume that you can't hear them and don't even want to talk to you because you look like a dork!

Items.name: HUSKY CARD
Items.passive: Your HUSKY CARD is on the steps of Suzzallo Library!
Items.active: You throw your HUSKY CARD away!

Hazards.name: TOURISTS
Hazards.canPass: The tourists ignore you and you successfully avoid any nuisance.
Hazards.cannot: There are tourists over there! I don't want them to bother me!

Hazards.name: EX
Hazards.canPass: Your ex does not recognize you as you walk past them.
Hazards.cannot: Oh no, your ex is over there! They might recognize you if you walk by!

Hazards.name: OLD FRIENDS
Hazards.canPass: You pass your high school friends unnoticed.
Hazards.cannot: You see your old high school pals. You'd rather avoid them...

Hazards.name: CROWD
Hazards.canPass: The crowd now parts due to your god-like status.
Hazards.cannot: A big annoying crowd is in your way!

Locations.name: DICK'S DRIVE-IN
Locations.desc: You are at Dick's! The smell of delicious burgers fills the air.

Locations.name: SAFEWAY
Locations.desc: You arrive at Safeway! Nothing really special here, mostly just fake IDs and parking lots.

Locations.name: GREEK ROW
Locations.desc: You are in Greek Row! You're getting further away from campus...

Locations.name: THE AVE
Locations.desc: You are on University Way NE! Maybe try heading to campus...

Locations.name: NORTH CAMPUS
Locations.desc: You are standing next to the dorms in the north part of campus. Not much going on here...

Locations.name: WEST CAMPUS
Locations.desc: You are in west campus! It seems lively to the east.

Locations.name: RED SQUARE
Locations.desc: You are now in central campus! You can go lots of places from here.

Locations.name: LIGHT RAIL
Locations.desc: You've made your way to the light rail! Maybe you can go home now...
